Name: ABERRATION TOWN
About the game: The end of the world is coming soon! Survive among endless zombies! Content and gameplay: You will spawn with Police 9mm pistol. After 15 seconds that game began, Zombies will spawn some spots. Kill the zombies to gain experience and cash. Upgrade your weapons or buy new gun with that cash. It's endless survival game. Zombies will getting stronger and stronger, also gives more funds and exps. Control - Alive: WASD: Basic movements R: Reloading M1: Fire M2: Aiming L-Shift: Sprinting T: Using chat
